original_text: Now, while we are in our body here on earth, we cry inside ourselves. We want to go and live in our house that is in heaven. Corinthians 4 Corinthians 6
korean_text: 참으로 우리가 여기 있어 탄식하며 하늘로부터 오는 우리 처소로 덧입기를 간절히 사모하노라

sentences.original_text: Now, while we are in our body here on earth,
sentences.korean_translation: 지금 우리가 이 땅에 있는 동안에,

sentences.original_text: We want to go and live
in our house that is in heaven.
